channel.title: Help with .htaccess' RewriteRule?
channel.description:
ok ok so im trying to make it so if you goto "www.somesite.com/somefolder/Something" it will show the page "www.somesite.com/somefolder/index.php?Article=Something" but the url will still be "www.somesite.com/somefolder/Something"
for some reason my host gets 500 internal error if I put the code below :/
[code] # Yes this is in the .htaccess file <IfModule mod_rewrite.c> RewriteEngine on RewriteBase / RewriteRule ^somefolder/?(.*)$ /somefolder/index.php?Article=$1 [L,QSA] </IfModule> [/code]
but if i put..
[code] # Yes this is in the .htaccess file <IfModule mod_rewrite.c> RewriteEngine on RewriteBase / RewriteRule ^somefolder/?([A-Za-z0-9]+)$ /somefolder/index.php?Article=$1 [L,QSA] </IfModule> [/code]
it will work :/
This is all fine and good but i need help with the special characters (thing's that aern't [A-Za-z0-9], thing's like spaces and what not). So. any help :/
Thanks
~Barluxia ;)

item.title: Help with .htaccess' RewriteRule?
item.dc:creator: @marluxia marluxia
item.description:
@marluxia wrote:

ok ok so im trying to make it so if you goto “www.somesite.com/somefolder/Something” it will show the page “www.somesite.com/somefolder/index.php?Article=Something” but the url will still be “www.somesite.com/somefolder/Something”

for some reason my host gets 500 internal error if I put the code below 

# Yes this is in the .htaccess file
<IfModule mod_rewrite.c>
RewriteEngine on
RewriteBase /
RewriteRule ^somefolder/?(.*)$ /somefolder/index.php?Article=$1 [L,QSA]
</IfModule>

but if i put…

# Yes this is in the .htaccess file
<IfModule mod_rewrite.c>
RewriteEngine on
RewriteBase /
RewriteRule ^somefolder/?([A-Za-z0-9]+)$ /somefolder/index.php?Article=$1 [L,QSA]
</IfModule>

it will work

This is all fine and good but i need help with the special characters (thing’s that aern’t [A-Za-z0-9], thing’s like spaces and what not). So. any help

Thanks

~Barluxia

Read full topic
